entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
